comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Reverend Sylvester Beach was pastor of the First Presbyterian Church in Princeton, New Jersey from 1906 to 1923.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Beach was also secretary to the board of governors of Princeton Theological Seminary.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4445107815/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4445877376/]

In June, 1913, Beach received an honorary Doctor of Divinity degree from the College of Wooster [Ohio].

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: And NYT from November 22, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=990DE1D71E3BE633A... indicates that he officiated at the wedding of Woodrow Wilson's daughter Jessie. Beach was Wilson's former pastor.
